body_html:
I build it tensorflow on ubunu 64 and referred this link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/examples/android#building-in-android-studio-using-the-tensorflow-aar-from-jcenter. This problem can also produced, can't find x86 clang. the log is as bellows:
src/main/tools/process-wrapper-legacy.cc:56: "execvp(external/androidndk/ndk/toolchains/llvm/prebuilt/linux-x86/bin/clang, ...)": No such file or directory
After I copy the linux-x86_64 to linux-x86, Another problem exist:
clang: error: unable to execute command: Executable "as" doesn't exist!
Can you help fix this?

Can you help fix this?
body:
I build it tensorflow on ubunu 64  and referred this link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/examples/android#building-in-android-studio-using-the-tensorflow-aar-from-jcenter. This problem can also produced, can't find x86 clang. the log is as bellows:
src/main/tools/process-wrapper-legacy.cc:56: "execvp(external/androidndk/ndk/toolchains/llvm/prebuilt/linux-x86/bin/clang, ...)": No such file or directory
After I copy the linux-x86_64 to linux-x86, Another problem exist:
clang: error: unable to execute command: Executable "as" doesn't exist!
Can you help fix this?
